## ggplot2 Basics

### Histogram

```r
ggplot(data, aes(x = score)) +
  geom_histogram(bins = 30)
```

### Bar plot

```r
ggplot(data, aes(x = condition, y = score)) +
  geom_col()
```

### Scatter plot

```r
ggplot(data, aes(x = age, y = score)) +
  geom_point()
```

### Box plot

```r
ggplot(data, aes(x = condition, y = score)) +
  geom_boxplot()
```
